statements: UPDATE SQL_database_logs SET action = 'deleted' WHERE log_id = 1
UPDATE SQL_database_logs SET user_id = 10, table_name = 'users' WHERE log_id = 2
UPDATE SQL_database_logs SET user_id = 10, action = 'updated', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE SQL_database_logs SET query = 'SELECT * FROM users;', table_name = 'users' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE data_privacy_compliance SET access_time = '2023-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE access_patterns SET query_time = 5.75, login_time = '2023-01-16 09:15:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE data_privacy_compliance SET access_type='Read' WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100
UPDATE access_patterns SET query_time = 25.75, query_text='SELECT * FROM users' WHERE id = 5 AND user_id = 200
UPDATE risk_assessment_log SET action='approved' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_access_log SET accessed_columns='id, user_id' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE risk_assessment_log SET action = 'Approved' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE user_access_log SET accessed_columns = 'column1, column2' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE access_logs SET database_name='New Database', user_id=101 WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE access_logs SET database_name = 'New Database' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_assessments SET assessment_result = 'Approved', assessment_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE user_id = 5 AND risk_id = 3;
UPDATE data_privacy_risk_assessment SET timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:00:00', details = 'Updated risk assessment details' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE compliance_issues SET description = 'Privacy breach detected', timestamp = '2021-10-20 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 67890;
UPDATE data_privacy_risk_assessment SET action = 'Reviewed' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE compliance_issues SET description = 'Data breach incident resolved', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE issue_id = 98765;
